```{r}
library(tidyverse)
df <- read.csv("Merged_Data_060820 (1).txt", sep="\t")
df2 <- read.csv("study_17_081119 (1).txt", sep="/")
df2$Backchannel <- ifelse(df2$Backchannel==1,1,0)
summary(as.factor(df$Backchannel))
summary(as.factor(df$Task))
df %>% group_by(Task, Language) %>% summarise(d=n())
summary(as.factor(df$Repair))
bc <- df[df$Backchannel==1,]
summary(as.factor(df[df$Language=="Dansk",]$Backchannel))

df_test <- df%>% filter(Language=="Dansk") %>% select(Transcription, Backchannel, Pair) 
write.csv(df_test,"df_test_dansk.csv", row.names=F)
```
